| HistoryText             = The Missouri Marauders were a commando unit in [[World War II]]. They consisted of members of the National Guard who had been selected to receive commando training. They assisted [[Nicholas Fury (Earth-616)|Nick Fury]]'s [[Howling Commandos (WWII) (Earth-616)|Howling Commandos]] on a mission to destroy a bridge in [[France]].
